definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_is_tagged_in"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">malice_or_mercy:corrupt_entity</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">corrupt_fire</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:corruptFireVariable</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityItem</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
